name: Confédération des Syndicats Chrétiens
membership:
ETUC  European Trade Union Confederation
ITUC  International Trade Union Confederation
goal: ACV-CSC is the largest Belgian Trade Union, defending the rights and interests of 1.600.000 affiliates
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Policies: Employment Policies, Social Policies, Macroeconomic Policies, Better Regulation and REFIT, Tax Justice

Legislative files related to the European Pillar of Social Rights and to the fight against social dumping
